title: Update Mastra packages to latest versions
description:
Update all Mastra packages from beta to stable @latest.

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-26-mastra-1-0-upgrade/2026-01-26-mastra-1-0-upgrade-spec.md`

**Current versions:**
- mastra: ^1.0.0-beta.12
- @mastra/core: ^1.0.0-beta.19
- @mastra/pg: ^1.0.0-beta.11
- @mastra/memory: ^1.0.0-beta.10
- @mastra/loggers: ^1.0.0-beta.3
- @mastra/libsql: ^1.0.0-beta.10

**Command:**
```bash
npm install @mastra/core@latest @mastra/loggers@latest @mastra/memory@latest @mastra/pg@latest @mastra/libsql@latest mastra@latest
```

**After updating:**
1. Verify package.json shows stable versions (not beta)
2. Run `npm run build` to verify build passes
3. Run `npx tsc --noEmit` to verify TypeScript compiles

⚠️ Do not close until all packages are updated and build passes.
acceptance_criteria: npm install succeeds; package.json shows @latest versions (not beta); npm run build passes; npx tsc --noEmit passes
closed_reason: Updated packages to stable versions: @mastra/core 1.0.4, mastra 1.0.1, @mastra/memory 1.0.0, @mastra/pg 1.0.0, @mastra/loggers 1.0.0, @mastra/libsql 1.0.0. Added resumeSchema to workflow steps to fix TypeScript errors.
